text: khuda ne kisee aadamee ke seene mein do dil nahin paida kiye ki (ek hee vakt do iraade kar sake) aur na usane tumhaaree beeviyon ko jin se tum jehaar karate ho tumhaaree maen bana dee aur na usane tumhaare liye paalakon ko tumhaare bete bana diye. ye to faqat tumhaaree munh bolee baat (aur zubaanee jama kharch) hai aur (chaahe kisee ko buree lage ya achchhee) khuda to sachchee kahata hai aur seedhee raah dikhaata hai.
